meanings.sent1: Last week, we went on a family vacation.
meanings.sent2: I have a dentist appointment next week.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the vase last week.
meanings.sent4: The excitement of the new school year filled the air last week.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked bread lingered in the kitchen all week.

meanings.definition: A period of seven consecutive days, typically starting on Sunday and ending on Saturday.
meanings.sent1: This week, I have a lot of homework to do.
meanings.sent2: We always have a family dinner on Friday night each week.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel managed to steal all the nuts for the week in one go.
meanings.sent4: The week unfolded like a carefully scripted play.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed through the house all week long.

meanings.definition: A period of seven days ending on Saturday or Sunday.
meanings.sent1: Next week, we are planning a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent2: I like to relax and read a book on the weekends each week.
meanings.sent3: The magician performed a new trick every day of the week.
meanings.sent4: The week slipped through my fingers like sand.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers bloomed in the garden throughout the week.
